page.title: 11RELIGION AROUND KIRKSTEAD
page.content: {RELIGION AROUND KIRKSTEAD & W.SPA 7% of the community attend a place of worship each Sunday.Most people attend church 3 times a year,Christmas, Easter and Harvest Festival. The established church,the{Methodist,}has over 50% of the population being Christened,married or buried from it.Broadway Methodist Church is part of the Coningsby Circuit of 13 churches with only one minister in charge.With 2 services per Sunday,50 atttend the morning, and 20 in the evening.The average age of its 117 members is 60.Westerly,a retirement home for Methodist local preachers is nearby.The{Church of England}members meet at St.Peter's.1 minister covers 4 churches.25/30 attend,it has an elderly congregation.The church has oversight of the spiritual welfare of St.Hugh's Preparatory School.
